modShortDescription: Find the colored eggs by hunting "Easter Rabbits" or in loot containers like a birdnest. 50 eggs (different colors) can be crafted to a "Golden Egg".
modDescription:
Find the colored eggs by hunting “Easter Rabbits” or in loot containers like a birdnest. 50 [eggs](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-food/) (different colors) can be crafted to a “Golden Egg”, which gives you a special chest with loot, after you eat it.

**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/ktk6dn2lszpzrz4/AAAiOUPS0VT6QOV_2UCfSJ8Ta?dl=1)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/5564-easter-rabbits-eggs/).

**Credits:** Slawa
